task.title: Add or Update an Address
task.shortdesc: This tutorial will help you update existing addresses using the MyPack Portal at NC State University.

taskbody.prereq: You must be a student at NC State University. You must be logged in to your student account to have access to the change address page.

step.cmd: From the left-hand navigation menu, select Addresses.
Under the appropriate header, click on the address box for the address you wish to change.
Update the address fields as necessary
